original_text: Each chariot that they bought in Egypt cost 600 pieces of silver. Each horse cost 150 pieces of silver. They also sold chariots and horses to all the kings of the Hittites and to the kings of Syria.
korean_text: 애굽에서 들여온 병거는 한 대에 은 육백 세겔이요 말은 한 필에 백오십 세겔이라 이와 같이 헷 사람의 모든 왕과 아람 왕들에게 그것들을 되팔기도 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Each chariot that they bought in Egypt
Each horse cost 150 pieces of silver
They also sold chariots and horses
to all the kings of the Hittites
and to the kings of Syria
